name: Slime Slayer (itch) (bayukanta25)
description:
Slime Slayer is a side-scroller action game that tells the story of a world filled with slime. The only thing that can kill slimes is Slime Slayer and his legendary sword, but Slime Slayer is also very weak against slimes so he will die if he touches them. So he need to kill all the slime or reach the gate of purification before the slime armageddon begins in 60 seconds.

To play you need to download the file, unzip them and run the Slime Slayer.exe file

Slime Slayer control is very easy

  • Up key = Jump
  • Left and Right key = Go left and right
  • D key = Attack
